Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

is it just me or are you guys also experiencing something weird when your craft is Standing on the LT-1 Landing Struts?

I have to do further testing when I get home but it seems like they just colapse even when the suspension is locked.

Just saw that happen when I got home to Kerbin and we already had that issue when .22 got out.
Used 3 and did an 6 m/s landing with an 15 ton test probe on Kerbin, they did not even floored.
Hm.. Weird. Thanks for testing magnemoe
Did you break the suspension? That was introduced as a feature in either .23 or .23.5, can't remember which.

Did you break the suspension? That was introduced as a feature in either .23 or .23.5, can't remember which.

Thats possible, Gus. Yesterday I had no Problems with the legs at all so I guess it was probably just me
